title: [1.7.10][FastCraft——迅速工艺]更流畅的MC，提升FPS
author: Park_Li
txt_content:
本帖最后由 gooding300 于 2019-9-14 00:23 编辑 

此MOD修复了1.7.10的滞后问题（帧数突然降到0然后卡住一会），受到了魔戒MOD作者、Extrabiomes MOD作者、湿度控制 Mod 作者的认可和推荐！

以下是官方介绍的翻译：
FastCraft 是一个小mod，明显提高了客户端和服务器性能而且不改变游戏内容。

此mod在服务器和客户端上都可使用。它不需要任何配置， 拖入mods文件夹即可。可能有 bug ，有些代码需要进一步测试，推荐在使用它前备份游戏存档。


下载地址（版本1.25）：
http://files.player.to/fastcraft-1.25.jar（原下载地址，不需要翻墙）
http://pan.baidu.com/s/1eS9UJIy（备份，推荐从原下载地址下载）

以往版本下载：http://pan.baidu.com/share/home?uk=2739494675#category/type=0




修复 1.7.10 的滞后体验！

Mojang真的搞砸了 1.7.10，引入了大量的不应该有的滞后。

如果你遭受着非常严重的滞后、低帧速率，那么请试下此MOD——它在 1.7.10 上产生了神奇的效果。流畅如 1.5.2 再世。

关于 1.7.10，你体验的很多滞后并不是MOD导致的——这是一个普遍的问题，原因是当客户端有大量空载时的重新照明计算 （仅有绝对白痴的程序员才会在空载区域上运行照明计算！mod仅使此问题更剧烈，直到它引起游戏崩溃（任何大计算量的改变）。也就是说MOD根本不是导致这一问题的元凶——显然这是1.7.10已知的问题。(AW mod Shadowmage 提供的信息）

向minecraft添加更多维度将使问题变得更差，但没有任何mod的作者可修复它。你更改世界、创作更多mod，但问题变得更差。

这里有关于此问题的几个线索：
http://www.minecraftforge.net/forum/index.php/topic,21229.0.html （LexManos 想说它不是Forge的问题）
http://forum.feed-the-beast.com/threads/1-7-10-chunk-generation-lag.48182/page-2 （到FTB threads查看更多信息）

看来此问题仅体现在客户端，但也对服务器构成影响（SSP /局域网共享游戏）

这是名为Fastcraft的'mod修补程序' ，真正帮助改善滞后问题：

http://forum.industrial-craft.net/index.php?page=Thread&postID=165893#post165893

在我设置完后出现了奇迹，之前1.7.10几乎不能玩。
Curing the 1.7.10 Lagfest!

Mojang has REALLY screwed up 1.7.10 and introduced a vast amount of lag that just shouldn't be there.

If you are suffering from very bad lag, low frame rates and next to zero chunck updates then try this - its worked wonders on my 1.7.10 set up. Smooth as 1.5.2 used to be now.
Regarding the unfeasible amount of lag some people are suffering on 1.7.10, for those of you experiencing lots and lots of lag - its not primarily a mod issue - it is a vanilla problem that is caused by block-relight calculations when chunks are unloaded on the client-side (only an absolute idiot of a programmer runs lighting calculations on blocks that are UNLOADED! - mods merely exacerbate this problem until it becomes unplayable (anything that causes changes in a chunk). Meaning, there is nothing at all that modders can do about the problem -- apparently it is a 'known issue' with 1.7.10. (info courtesy of Shadowmage on the AW mod)

Any mods that add world-gen will make the problem worse, but there is nothing any of the authors can do to fix it. The more mods that make world gen changes you have, the worse the problem gets.

Here are a couple threads regarding the issue
http://www.minecraftforge.net/forum/index.php/topic,21229.0.html (LexManos trying to say it is not a forge problem)
http://forum.feed-the-beast.com/threads/1-7-10-chunk-generation-lag.48182/page-2 (more info from FTB threads)

It seems the issue only manifests itself on a client that is also acting as a server (SSP / lan shared games)

There is a 'mod-patch' called Fastcraft that really helps cure the lag problems:

http://forum.industrial-craft.net/index.php?page=Thread&postID=165893#post165893

This worked wonders on my set up, which in 1.7.10 was virtually unplayable before.



这里引用一些人尝试过本mod后的感想：

[diamond_gem]湿度控制 Mod 作者 Zeno410[diamond_gem]："此点就能得百分之一百的支持。我测试它时我能飞过正在生成的 1.7.10 * 高地飞山 *  有59 fps （我垂直同步最大值是60）。之前仅有 * 0 *。我的老铁啊。每个人皆安装此mod吧。"
"You deserve like 100 upvotes for pointing this out. I just tested it and 1.7.10 I can fly through *Highlands Flying Mountains* being generated at 59 fps (60 is my max because of Vsync). Before it was *0*. Holy freakin' cow. Install this, everybody."

[diamond_sword]Extrabiomes Mod 作者 JLBShecky[diamond_sword]："对我也曾试着减少树叶产生的滞后，在 1.7.10上这绝对是普遍的事，而FastCraft 真的有助，故此一旦我下一内测出来，我将附上推荐与到 FastCraft thread的链接，在我看来它是真正的救星"。
"Yeah so I also played around trying to reduce the lag on via playing with reducing the ticks to our leaves, and it is definitely a vanilla thing in 1.7.10, and FastCraft truly does help, so as soon as I get the next alpha build out I'll make sure to recommend and link to the FastCraft thread as it is really a life saver in my opinion."

Zothen："我并没有期望太多，但 FastCraft 确实产生了某样魔法。再次感谢""I didnt expect much, but FastCraft does some kind of magic. Thanks again "

翔麟的视频介绍，大概4分18秒开始 http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XNzk1MzUxMDIw.html

魔戒MOD facebook 专页：“那里的你！对，说的就是你 ！你好 ！您是否遇到了滞后的中洲？你当然是。而我也......直到论坛用户 MohawkyMagoo 发布了一个小 mod 的链接才解决问题。 http://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/mapping-and-modding/minecraft-mods/1287390-the-lord-of-the-rings-mod-bringing-middle-earth-to?page=238#c4771 我有一台很好的电脑，配置不算落后，但我的游戏出现冻屏、卡顿，在茂密的森林生物群落通常表现不佳（黑森林、范贡森林、罗丝罗瑞恩等）。'FastCraft' mod 100%修复了上述所有问题，绝不欺你。我向你保证，安装此mod后，我测试任的何生物群系再也没看见任何滞后或冻屏现象（以前有些生物群落每隔几秒钟就滞后或冻屏） 。甚至加载新的区域时，也没有滞后。意外的惊喜： 滞后的主要原因不是我的 mod，也不是 Minecraft Forge，也不是您的计算机： 是Mojang的错！如果你今天仅做一件事，那就是下载此 mod。我不能保证其表现在你那里和我的完全一样，但它一定将产生进步！ ”



更新历史：
Version 1.23
- fix compatibility with ruinsmod
- fix compatibility with named entities with invalid AABBs as used for server-side for banners
- fix crash from setting enableCullingTweaks to false
Version 1.22
- much improved culling and related tasks
- faster text rendering
- faster serialization and deserialization
- better tick and update scheduling
- compatibility improvements
. additional misc. tweaks and fixes
Version 1.21
- fix not creating the config folder if it doesn't exist
Version 1.20
- much improved support for large texture packs, which was FC's most significant limitation
- slightly improved simulation performance
- improved support for odd sized textures, e.g. with anisotropic filtering
- compatibility improvements
- new config file for niche issues and later somewhat game play changing optimizations
- some detection for corrupted or incorrect installs
- new debug options
Version 1.17/1.18/1.19
- additional world gen lag reduction
- fix texture glitches with Optifine
- release preparations
- debug options for frequent issues
- bug fixes
Version 1.14/1.15/1.16
- much faster chunk rendering (caching)
- slightly optimized path finding (ai)
- minor world gen related rendering tweaks
- ColoredLights compatibility
Version 1.13
- faster chunk loading (mostly for servers)
- minor startup time optimization
- version checker notifying about updates
Version 1.12
- improve performance for some rarer cases
Version 1.10/1.11
- fix ShadersMod compatibility
- improve performance for very tile entity heavy worlds
Version 1.9
- lots of compatibility and bug fixes
Version 1.8
- fix edge case startup crash
Version 1.7
- fix missed lighting hook
- client side improvements
Version 1.6
- added -Dfastcraft.asm.permissive
Version 1.4+1.5
- fix reported crash issue
Version 1.3
- fix internal class loading issue
Version 1.2
- new minor performance tweak
- memory optimization for lower end systems
Version 1.1
- Reduce GC pressure from light updates.
Version 1.0
- Initial release.

我的世界豹猫驯服方法
　　玩我的世界的玩家想要驯服豹猫帮你打怪或观赏吗？方法很简单，这边简单介绍一下！
　　先去钓鱼，然后拿着鱼去森林里找豹猫，找到后他会跑，不要想着追到他，你不可能比他跑得快，只能在后面跟着他，看他回头了，你就站在原地不要动，一动他还会跑，他会慢慢靠近你，等离你进的时候，就把鱼右键喂给它，就可以了，注意，他回头后千万不要动，如果他又跑了，再继续跟着他。

replies.author: lhl2351783565
replies.txt_content: 我说怎么游戏这么卡，还以为是电脑问题，不过总算是有解决办法了，感激不敬。
楼主更一下1.11版本吧

replies.author: ZXCVEA
replies.txt_content: 这个mod解决了我的大问题啊，实在太棒了

replies.author: tufeiyes
replies.txt_content: 我早点发现这个帖子就好了 第一次玩的 时候没多久 挖了好久好久的矿后发现很卡忍着玩了没多久游戏崩盘  刚刚才删了一个我认为不错的地形 靠着河水 对面是村庄 哎 多好啊 某次在登录后发现很卡 卡到你打开一个箱子 点了半天 没反应 实在没办法 我只能删档了 可惜
终于兼容光影了，好评

replies.txt_content:
